subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|爆発|ばくはつ}}: [[explosion]]
* {{ja-r|爆%発%的|ばく%はつ%てき}}: [[explosive]]
* {{ja-r|爆薬|ばくやく}}: [[gunpowder]]
* {{ja-r|空爆|くうばく}}: [[air raid]]
* {{ja-r|爆弾|ばくだん}}: a [[bomb]]
* {{ja-r|水爆|すいばく}}: [[hydrogen bomb]]
* {{ja-r|原爆|げんばく}}: [[atomic bomb]], [[nuclear bomb]]
* {{ja-r|原%水%爆|げん%すい%ばく}}: [[atomic bomb|atomic]] and [[hydrogen bomb]]s, [[nuclear weapon]]s in general
* {{ja-r|被%爆|ひ%ばく}}: being [[bombed]]
* {{ja-r|爆殺|ばくさつ}}: [[killing]] by [[bombing]]
* {{ja-r|爆死|ばくし}}: [[death]] by [[explosion]]
* {{ja-r|爆乳|ばくにゅう}}: extremely large [[breast]]s
* {{ja-r|爆走|ばくそう}}: [[explosively]] [[loud]] and [[fast]] [[driving]] {{qualifier|of a car or motorbike}}
* {{ja-r|自%爆|じ%ばく}}: [[suicide bombing]]; [[deliberate]]ly [[crash]]ing or [[explode|exploding]] one's [[vehicle]]
{{der-bottom}}
